mapper.sql: id, rollin_time, quotation_num, is_oil_gas, plat_pro_category, pro_category, cate_count, is_kerui_equip_parts, pro_brand, quote_unit_price, quote_total_price
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from inquiry_sku
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT COUNT(*) from erui_rfq.v_inquiry_sku
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT COUNT(1) as goodsCount from erui_rfq.v_inquiry_sku WHERE 1=1 AND quotation_num IN (SELECT quotation_num FROM erui_rfq.v_inquiry_count WHERE 1=1
and rollin_time BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") and DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s")
AND quotation_num IS NOT NULL )

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(CASE plat_pro_category WHEN '平台' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) as platCount, IFNULL(SUM(CASE plat_pro_category WHEN '非平台' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) as notPlatCount from erui_rfq.v_inquiry_sku WHERE 1=1 AND quotation_num IN (SELECT quotation_num FROM erui_rfq.v_inquiry_count WHERE 1=1
and rollin_time BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") and DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s")
AND quotation_num IS NOT NULL )

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(CASE is_oil_gas WHEN '是' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) as oil, IFNULL(SUM(CASE is_oil_gas WHEN '否' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0)+ IFNULL(SUM(CASE is_oil_gas WHEN NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) as notOil from erui_rfq.v_inquiry_sku WHERE 1=1 AND quotation_num IN (SELECT quotation_num FROM erui_rfq.v_inquiry_count WHERE 1=1
and rollin_time BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") and DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s")
AND quoted_status IN
#{quote}
AND quotation_num IS NOT NULL )
mapper.insert:
insert into inquiry_sku (rollin_time, quotation_num, is_oil_gas, plat_pro_category, pro_category, cate_count, is_kerui_equip_parts, pro_brand, quote_unit_price, quote_total_price) values
(#{sku.rollinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sku.quotationNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sku.isOilGas,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sku.platProCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sku.proCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sku.cateCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sku.isKeruiEquipParts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sku.proBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sku.quoteUnitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sku.quoteTotalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into inquiry_sku (id, rollin_time, quotation_num, is_oil_gas, plat_pro_category, pro_category, cate_count, is_kerui_equip_parts, pro_brand, quote_unit_price, quote_total_price) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{rollinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{quotationNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isOilGas,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platProCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cateCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isKeruiEquipParts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quoteUnitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{quoteTotalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into inquiry_sku
id,
rollin_time,
quotation_num,
is_oil_gas,
plat_pro_category,
pro_category,
cate_count,
is_kerui_equip_parts,
pro_brand,
quote_unit_price,
quote_total_price,

mapper.update:
update inquiry_sku
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
rollin_time = #{record.rollinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
quotation_num = #{record.quotationNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_oil_gas = #{record.isOilGas,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
plat_pro_category = #{record.platProCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pro_category = #{record.proCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cate_count = #{record.cateCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_kerui_equip_parts = #{record.isKeruiEquipParts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pro_brand = #{record.proBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
quote_unit_price = #{record.quoteUnitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
quote_total_price = #{record.quoteTotalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

update inquiry_sku set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, rollin_time = #{record.rollinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, quotation_num = #{record.quotationNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_oil_gas = #{record.isOilGas,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plat_pro_category = #{record.platProCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pro_category = #{record.proCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cate_count = #{record.cateCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_kerui_equip_parts = #{record.isKeruiEquipParts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pro_brand = #{record.proBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, quote_unit_price = #{record.quoteUnitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, quote_total_price = #{record.quoteTotalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update inquiry_sku
rollin_time = #{rollinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
quotation_num = #{quotationNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_oil_gas = #{isOilGas,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
plat_pro_category = #{platProCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pro_category = #{proCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cate_count = #{cateCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_kerui_equip_parts = #{isKeruiEquipParts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pro_brand = #{proBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
quote_unit_price = #{quoteUnitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
quote_total_price = #{quoteTotalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update inquiry_sku set rollin_time = #{rollinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, quotation_num = #{quotationNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_oil_gas = #{isOilGas,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plat_pro_category = #{platProCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pro_category = #{proCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cate_count = #{cateCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_kerui_equip_parts = #{isKeruiEquipParts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pro_brand = #{proBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, quote_unit_price = #{quoteUnitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, quote_total_price = #{quoteTotalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
